meanings.sent1: She felt embarrassed by his vauntful claims of greatness.
meanings.sent2: His vauntful attitude often rubbed people the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: Despite his vauntful nature, he couldn't even finish the race.
meanings.sent4: Her vauntful behavior was like a loud trumpet in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The vauntful peacock strutted around the farm, showing off its feathers.

meanings.sent1: The vauntful queen demanded constant admiration from her subjects.
meanings.sent2: His vauntful display of wealth made others envious.
meanings.sent3: Even the mirror couldn't handle her vauntful reflection.
meanings.sent4: Her vauntful demeanor was like a shiny, fragile glass sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The vauntful actor refused to take on any role that didn't showcase his talents.
